member.name: T:Fire_API.ref.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Fire_API.ref.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Fire_API.ref.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Fire_API.ref.Fire_API_ref.EncryptionType
member.summary:
EncryptionType may be :
- FileContent (only the content of the file)
- FileName (only the name of the file)
- Both (FileName + FileContent)

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.Fire_API_ref.AddTemp(Fire_API.ref.TempObject,System.Boolean)
member.param: The TempObject with the temp file/folder properties.
If setted to true, the temp file/golder will be automatically generated.

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.Fire_API_ref.RemoveTemp(System.Int64)
member.summary: Remove a temp folder/file by giving the identifier.

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.Fire_API_ref.EditTempFile(System.Int64,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Edit a temp file by giving the identifier and the content of the file.

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.Fire_API_ref.GetTempFileContent(System.Int64,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Get the content of a temp file.

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.Fire_API_ref.RenameTemp(System.Int64,Fire_API.ref.TempObject,System.String)
member.summary: Rename a temp folder by giving the identifier.

member.name: T:Fire_API.ref.TempObject
member.summary: This object is for define properties for a temp file/folder.
